scripts.//clean/**************: Borra o limpia carpeta 'build' del producto transpilado final (.js)

scripts.build2-mac: tsc && cp src/*json build && cp -r src/api-docs/. build/api-docs
scripts.start-dev: tsc && copy src\*.json build && tsc && node build/index.js
